title: Two Secretaries appointed by President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has taken steps to appoint Secretaries to the  Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment and the Ministry of Technology and Investment Promotion.

A gazette published recently underlined that H. K. W. M. N. B. Hapuhinna has been appointed as the Secretary Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment and Jayantha de Silva has been appointed as the Secretary Ministry of Technology and Investment Promotion.
